name: Caution: Falling Tanks (BETA)
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Caution : Falling Tanks is a local versus top-down shooter in which player-controlled tanks attempt to push each other off the edge of the level. Players can choose from a variety of tanks, each one loaded with a unique arsenal, and fight in dynamic battle arenas. The more damage they take, the more push force is applied, and the harder they fall.

If you have any questions, comments or criticism please contact us at hermes@theuncanny.net. We appreciate your feedback!

FEATURES (BETA release)

  • 2 to 4 player local-versus gameplay
  • Rebindable controller support (mouse and keyboard not supported)
  • Two dynamic levels
  • Three game modes
  • Six tanks with two fire modes each
  • Original soundtrack

PLANNED FEATURES

  • More maps
  • More tank
  • More game modes
  • Bots
  • PvE coop
